2. Install all dependencies according to instructions.
3. Build according to instructions

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @nadiasvertex did you follow [these instructions](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/building/internals.md#type-catalog)?

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Let's make sure that @nadiasvertex was able to fix their problem before we close the issue as he's unable to reopen the issue or comment after it's closed.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
You need to do [these two](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/building/internals.md#preliminary-steps) steps, as @andschwa mentioned. They corresponds to `resgen` and `typegen`.
We should add a link in the manual build steps, if we don't have it.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
We [have a link](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/building/linux.md#build-manually):

> There are two preliminary steps that apply to all operating systems,
the [ResGen](internals.md#resgen) and [type catalog generation](internals.md#type-catalog),
documented in [internals of build process](internals.md#preliminary-steps).

comments.author: nadiasvertex
comments.body:
I would also like to note that it would be really, really easy for you to take that list of scattered commands and put it in the "else" section of build.sh. It's sort of incomprehensible that it wasn't done.

I will also grant that a more careful reading of the instructions might have led me to understand that I need to perform several different commands. However, it would have been very clear if all of the pieces necessary to perform a manual build were just listed directly in the section "Manual Build".

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
@nadiasvertex yes, unfortunately, you need to add runtime `ubuntu.16.10-x64` to few `project.json` files to onboard a new platform. That's how `dotnet` cli works.

Namely:

1. https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/TypeCatalogGen/project.json
2. https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/TypeCatalogParser/project.json
3. https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/ResGen/project.json
4. https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/powershell-unix/project.json

Maybe I missed something else, but the error message would point to other possible missed places.

comments.body: Please help us improve the documentation, we welcome contributions! :)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Did you git clean and re run the type catalog parser? Adding the framework necessarily downloaded new libraries with potentially different types, as the packages for .NET are not guaranteed to be compatible among different runtimes.
